name: RSI Forums - Fix OP Date/Time
description: Fixes Original Posts on forums.robertspaceindustries.com to show actual posting date/time, rather than "12:00am Jan 1, 1970".  The formatting is a little off, it seems some site Javascript is setting the width and doesn't get it correct.
additional_info: Alternatively, and it avoids the formatting issues, you can use a TamperMonkey/GreaseMonkey script instead.  Don't have both active!  See: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/185268
